mil7.7.9:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘balisikassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.7.9:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena nanena uttarim samannaphalani uddharitabbani.
mil7.7.9:1.4: Idam, maharaja, balisikassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.9:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, balisiko parittakam vadhitva vipulam labhamadhigacchati;
mil7.7.9:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena parittalokamisamattam pariccajitabbam.
mil7.7.9:2.3: Lokamisamattam, maharaja, pariccajitva yogi yogavacaro vipulam samannaphalam adhigacchati.
mil7.7.9:2.4: Idam, maharaja, balisikassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
